response.overview: An investigation of how Hollywood's fabled stories have deeply influenced how Americans feel about transgender people, and how transgender people have been taught to feel about themselves.
response.title: Disclosure

titles.title: トランスジェンダーとハリウッド: 過去、現在、そして
